text: Georgi Gervanov Ananiev (; 12 April 1950 – 26 January 2021) was a Bulgarian politician. He was Minister of Defence between 1997 and 1999. Ananiev was born in Pernik Province, Bulgaria. Ananiev died on 26 January 2021 of COVID-19 during the COVID-19 pandemic in Bulgaria, aged 70.In Memoriam: Bulgaria’s Ex- Minister of Defense Georgi Ananiev Died of Coronavirus ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Bulgarian politicians Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Bulgaria
title: Georgi Ananiev
